channel.title: Pk Zones Will Rep++
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me how to make it so my Banks are completely safe,and the rest of my server is pvp?Thanks. I'm using PI 317 ErasedPkz.
Also,if anyone can help me-I need help with changing the sprites of my cache,i dont know where to find them.Again,using ErasedPkz for the cache(its got like 6 different sprite packs ingame)
